reviewText:
Come on Manga!
It's about time you release the Mad Bull 34 series on Blue-ray or at least DVD!

I'm no anime expert, but I really enjoyed this movie. Even through the sex, gore and violence it was fun, start to end. Cheesey humor in spots, but that made it even better for me. I can't wait to get the rest of the series!
This Show is great lot's of sex and violence more of a comedy than a drama because its so over the top. Only i wish it would come out on dvd
A dark anime, focusing on the very real problems in America today. Loads of violence and sex, how can you go wrong? :)
